segmentosSRT.text:
Mr. Long'er says
if you're busy he'll take a rain check.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: troops for both sides are everywhere.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
If you don't fight the Reds,
you fight the KMT.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
But who will look after my wife,
my kids, my old mother?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: Forget it. Try to save your own skin.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
if I weren't looking for my brother,
I wouldn't be wearing this uniform.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
Must be tens of thousands
of us trapped here.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: Put it on. We must survive.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: Besides, we're from the same town.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: Lao Quan, the place is deserted.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: Tell me what else I can do.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
But there were so many people,
I didn't come in.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: I've always felt terrible about Youqing.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text:
I've often tried to give you money.
You'd never accept it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: It's all in this account. Take it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17

segmentosSRT.text: and my heart will be at ease.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_17
